## Steering committee:

To get permission to set up a project under the project database you need to send a application to the steering committee.

Members of the steering committee is:

-   Gunnar Vase Toft, GUNTOF@rm.dk
-   Daniel Witte, daniel.witte@ph.au.dk
-   Sigrid Bjerge Gribsholt, sigrgrib@rm.dk
-   Rasmus Møller Jørgensen, rasmujer@rm.dk
-   Kasper Norman, KANOAN@rm.dk
-   Marie Kempf Frydendahl, MAIPEE@rm.dk

## Application:

The application must contain the following:

-   Title of the project
-   A short resume of the project
-   PI of the project
-   How many users are expected to be working on the project (an estimate)
-   Which data the project should contain, register level is sufficient
-   Expected enddate of the project

## Next steps:

When the Steering committee has approved you request you are ready to continuing
